verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
G
A God of faithfulness
Without injustice
Good and upright is He
A God of faithfulness
Without injustice
Good and upright is He

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Ascribe greatness to our God the Rock
His work is perfect
And all His ways are just
Ascribe greatness to our God the Rock
His work is perfect
And all His ways are just
